title: Body Wrap Specialist
content: Theoretical knowledge and practical application of: body and facial mesotherapy, Egyptian body bandages, body wraps, cryo and thermo therapy, body exfoliation.

title: Wood Therapy
content: This certificate has been rewarded to the recipient for successfully completing a 16-hour training including theoretical knowledge and practical application of wooden massage tools on the face and full body.

title: Thai Reflexology
content: This certificate has been rewarded to the recipient for successfully completing a 8-hour training including theoretical knowledge and practical application of wooden massage tools on the face and full body.

title: Relax Woodtherapy
content: This certificate has been rewarded to the recipient for successfully completing a 8-hour training including theoretical knowledge and practical application of wooden massage tools on the face and full body.
